statements: DELETE FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM air_purifier_settings WHERE air_purifier_id = 5 AND fan_speed = 3;
DELETE FROM AirPurifierSettings WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND target_temperature < 25.0;
DELETE FROM AirPurifierSystem WHERE model = 'Model XYZ' AND AI_enabled = true;
DELETE FROM AirQualityLogs WHERE sensor_id = '2f5d58d6-c768-4ae2-857c-92a383fd8008' AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
